column2: in mèdio aŭtem Deos dijúdicat. ^ God hath stood in the congregation of gods
column3: and being in the midst of them he judgeth gods.

column2: et fácies peccatórum súmitis~? ^ How long will you judge unjustly
column3: and accept the persons of the wicked~?

column1: 3 ^ Judicáte eǧéno et pupìllo~; húmilem et páŭperem justificáte. ^ Judge for the needy and fatherless~; do justice to the humble and the poor.

column2: et eǧénum de manu peccatóris liberáte. ^ Rescue the poor
column3: and deliver the needy out of the hand of the sinner.

column2: nèqŭe intellexérunt~; in tènebrîs ámbulant~; movebùntur òmnia fundamènta terraĕ. ^ They have not known nor understood~; they walk on in darkness~; all the foundations of the earth shall be moved.

column3: et fílii excèlsi òmnes. ^ I have said
column4: "You are gods and all of you the sons of the most High.

column2: et sicut unus de princìpibus cadétis.~»^ But you like men shall die
column3: and shall fall like one of the princes."

column4: qŭóniam tu hereditábis in òmnibus ǧèntibus. ^ Arise
column7: for thou shalt inherit among all the nations.
